comment: Most bottles get better after the neck pour. This one went in the other direction. I’m trying hard to support this local distillery but, it’s just not working for me - and I love young ryes! Frustrating.
Some young ryes are interesting in a good way. This one is just young.
The neck pour was honey and white pepper, not something I usually get from a 95/5 rye. I’m looking forward to this one opening up over time.
